title: Hera’s Modern Life - Novel Updates
tags: Betrayal   Complex Family Relationships   Female Protagonist   God Protagonist   Goddesses   Gods   Handsome Male Lead   Jealousy   Misunderstandings   Mythology   Past Plays a Big Role   Persistent Love Interests   Popular Love Interests   Reincarnation   Secrets   Tragic Past
author: A Grain of Rice   一粒米饭
description:
Suddenly I was the Goddess of the world.

One month before my marriage, I had gone to Greece for my bachelor’s trip. One morning, I suddenly remembered that I had another name Hera, and –

I am a married woman, and my husband is Zeus.

What a desperate reality.>
